Shares of online food delivery aggregator Zomato rose above their initial public offering price after more than a year.

The stock hit an intraday high of Rs 76.3 per share before settling at Rs 75.8.

The company had priced its shares at Rs 76 during Rs 9,37…

articles.title: RBI permits loan default guarantee in digital lending: Will it boost fintech activity? - The Indian Express
